page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT IN SEAMILL
page.content: In Cunninghame district 26.7% of the male population is out of work and 16.9% of all females are out of work. This makes a total of 22.9% of the people in the district unemployed. {1506 People are employed in Seamill {and West Kilbride.}18% of the population work{outside}of the town. Most people work in Largs, Ardrossan, Saltcoats or Stevenston because there are more jobs there and they are not far away. {School leavers}mainly become unemployed but the{Youth Training {Scheme}is very good although they don't accept everybody. The Youth Training Scheme keeps young people off the streets and also teaches them skills which become useful when they get a job.
